formatted_address: 1, Jalan Eka, Horizon Hills, 79100 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Horizon Hills Golf & Country Club

reviews.text:
This is a fantastic place to enjoy iftar with family during Ramadan. The atmosphere is warm and welcoming, making it a perfect spot for a gathering. I was truly impressed with the menu, offering a great variety of delicious dishes. The highlight for me was the kambing bakar‚Äîit was tender, flavorful, and perfectly cooked. Asam pedas claypot also.. woahh the best üëçüëç

The overall dining experience was excellent, and considering the quality of the food and service, it‚Äôs definitely worth the price. Highly recommended for a satisfying and enjoyable iftar!
Dropped into the lil cafe there beside the pool. Quite decent indoor and outdoor space.... Downside, no power points if you want to stay there and do any work.

Went for a wedding dinner, foods are OK, atmosphere are good enough for a wedding dinner.

Design is a little old fashioned and the lights in the middle is blocking the view of the married couple from last row.

Over all, is quite a nice place to have a wedding dinner.

The course is in good condition. Challenging layout with many sand bunkers at strategic locations to test golfers‚Äô course management skill and accuracy. The green is very fast, just one light tap and the ball rolled a long distance. It‚Äôs buggy on track, hot to walk for afternoon flight. Our caddy is not effective, would not search ball for us, read the wrong line during putting and made mistakes in fetching the correct club. And we were told to tip the caddy by a fixed amount, not by the standard of service she provided.
Beautiful & elegant wedding hall. The variety of food was very good and tasty. Very suitable for less then 500 pax.

vicinity: 1, Jalan Eka, Horizon Hills, Iskandar Puteri
